features.featureTitle: Keep all user-facing admin/access-denied text in English, and ensure the existing frontend admin gating continues to work without editing any immutable frontend hook files (do not change `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)` or `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`). If any frontend change is needed, implement it only in non-immutable files and keep the current UX (Retry access check, Sign out, Return to Home).
